entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Is `InlineArray16<T>` intentionally excluded? #114514
  • Crossgen2 should emit a warning or error when two different versions of the same assembly are referenced #114513
  • [wasm] BrowserLocator.cs' could not be found. #114510
  • Assertion failure g_flsIndex != FLS_OUT_OF_INDEXES #114506
  • Customizing `ApplicationName` during host building breaks User Secrets #114505
  • Crossgen2 composite with JitOptimization causes R2R dump failures on linux #114504
  • GzipStream decompression memory (leak?) lingers in certain environments #114502
  • Excel Automation AddIn fails under .NET6+ #114500
  • Support folding feature switch conditions in ILC cctor interpreter (Native AOT) #114499
  • [API Proposal]: Add minimal QUERY verb support to HttpClient #114489
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Extend System.Linq.AsyncEnumerable to allow concurrent operator execution #114478
  • .NET TimeZoneInfo fails to recognize historical invalid times after 2025 tzdb update for America/Asuncion #114476
    Future
  • Update '[GeneratedComInterface]' to emit ILC-friendly vtables for RVA folding #114468
    Future

Closed

  • .NET 9 trimmed application fails with System.TypeLoadException (Method trimmed but interface still listed on type). #109850
    9.0.x
  • Request: make lttng-ust an optional build dependency #107406
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Custom the dotnet runtime root folder path #64430
    10.0.0
  • Create cDAC entrypoint same as DAC `CLRDataCreateInstance` #112583
    10.0.0
  • Use-cases for Swift interop in .NET 10 #95636
    10.0.0
  • Projection tooling for Swift interop in .NET 10 #95633
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/jit64/mcc/interop/mcc_i03/mcc_i03.cmd #108640
    10.0.0
  • SocketsHttpHandler retries with useless "Authorization" header when SystemNetworkCredential is in use #113145
    Future
  • .NET 6+ WebSocket HttpListener - memory leak #101022
    10.0.0
  • Mono.Linker.Tests.TestCases.All.DataFlow failure #114465
  • Assert failure: !CREATE_CHECK_STRING(!"Detected use of a corrupted OBJECTREF. Possible GC hole.") #114445
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: profiler/dynamicoptimization/DynamicOptimization/DynamicOptimization.cmd #114314
    10.0.0
  • Raise the `AppDomain.UnhandledException` event for exceptions outside the runtime. #102730
    10.0.0
  • Setting Thread.Name before Start() not working on macOS #106464
    Future
  • Improve code coverage for System.Xml.Schema #20411
  • how can make the release directory look a little more refreshing #111324
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove setting `$ORIGIN/netcoredeps` rpath #114512
    area-Host
  • Use the regular build scripts for -vs coreclr.sln #114511
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix ordering issue in interface trimming #114509
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Update Microsoft.NETCore.CoreDisTools nuget package from 1.4 to 1.5 #114507
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Sync shared code from aspnetcore #114498
    area-System.Net.Http, 10.0.0
  • Reduce string interpolation overhead #114497
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Use NOTIFY_ON_U2M_TRANSITIONS in SfiInit/SfiNext #114496
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add internal intrinsics for instance-based calli #114495
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, 10.0.0
  • Replace OptimizedInboxTextEncoder vectorization with SearchValues #114494
    area-System.Text.Encodings.Web, reduce-unsafe, 10.0.0
  • [cDAC] Implement IXCLRDataModule APIs SOS uses to read line numbers #114491
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Remove a few more unsafe code from STJ #114490
    area-System.Text.Json, reduce-unsafe
  • [RISC-V] Move lower 11 bits of indirection address to load / store offset #114488
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Simplify handling `Span` in the cctor interpreter #114487
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix IsVNConstantBound assert #114486
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • MLDsaOpenSsl + tests #114485
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Place read-only non-GC static bases into read-only section #114477
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Force storing GC state until we see a labeled IG #114475
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Print load immediate value in disassembly #114470
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Interpreter GC info stage 3: Report locals to the GC #114469
    area-VM-coreclr, area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • [android] Add -keepnativesymbols to Windows build #114466
    area-Build-mono
  • Add support to add new FieldRVAs to EnC #114463
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0

Merged

  • Fix broken System.Runtime.sln #114503
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Add convert aliases #114501
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [wasm] Add missing referenced file #114508
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix ordering issue in interface trimming #110098
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Enable jit optimization in crossgen testing #114464
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Make CertificateRequest et al work with ML-DSA #114471
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • Make lttng-ust an optional dependency. #113876
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Add Sqrt packedsimd alias #114493
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [wasm][interp] Filter out overmatched shift #114492
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Share common Uri redaction logic in Http #114483
    area-System.Net.Http, 10.0.0
  • [wasm][bench] Fix the template dir creation #114482
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [browser] remove dead code #114479
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [cDAC] Adds DAC like entrypoint with new COM interface #113899
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix link to documentation file #114481
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Remove unsafe code from WinHttpHandler TryGetHeaderName helper #114484
    area-System.Net.Http, reduce-unsafe, 10.0.0
  • [browser] profiler cleanup #114480
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Reduce unsafe from STJ #114154
    area-System.Text.Json, reduce-unsafe
  • Fix for "ld.lld: error: undefined symbol: _Uaarch64_setcontext" when doing build for FreeBSD-arm64 using internal libunwind #110432
    os-freebsd, area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Ignore DefaultCredentials when doing Basic & Digest auth in SocketsHttpHandler #113728
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Exit with quick_exit when using debug UCRT #109006
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [clr-interp] Add github notifications for code owners #114367
    needs-area-label
  • Dev/rokonec/101022 httplistner mem leak #114098
    area-System.Net
  • ILLink : Fix and a couple tweaks #114215
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Name native threads before start (macOS/Native AOT) #114249
    area-System.Threading
  • Fix GC hole with `rorx` instruction #114467
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add ability to raise `AppDomain.UnhandledException` event. #114392
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • Prepare cert tests for new signing algorithms #114416
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement, 10.0.0

Updated

  • Share implementation of ComWrappers between CoreCLR and NativeAOT #113907
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Utilize `Zba` extension instructions #113999
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: enhance escape analysis to understand local struct fields #113977
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Block inlines with different exception wrapping behavior #113849
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add `InlineArray16<T>` #114515
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Zip async implementation #114421
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2684445 #114238
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Use PME identity for DAC signing #113997
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Allow TargetOS and TargetRid to be overridden in DotNetBuild.props #113765
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [RISC-V] Simplifying the loop generated in genZeroInitFrameUsingBlockInit and jump encoding #114003
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: Shrink data section for const vector loads #114040
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Android] Run CoreCLR library tests on Android #114148
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-android, 10.0.0
  • Add bootstrapping build mechanism and enable for SourceBuild #114285
    source-build, area-Infrastructure
  • Optimize Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Memory #111050
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Use 'ref readonly' in 'Unsafe.AsPointer' #114406
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [coreclr][android] Don't build/ship unused GC variants for Android #114448
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-android
  • [release/9.0] Fix edge cases in Tarjan GC bridge (Android) #114391
    Servicing-approved, os-android, area-GC-mono, community-contribution, 9.0.5
  • [release/8.0-staging] JIT: Fix loop recognition bug in .NET 8 #114457
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.16
  • [infra][apple-mobile] Migrate MacCatalyst and iOS/tvOS simulator jobs to `osx.14.arm64.open` and `osx.15.amd64.open` queues #113313
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • JIT: Accelerate long -> floating casts on x86 #113930
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • disable/trim MetricsHandler when System.Diagnostics.Metrics.Meter.IsSupported is false #114326
    area-System.Net.Http, 10.0.0
  • Arm-64:[PAC][WIP]Add auth-strip in prolog and epilog of jitted methods #110472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add pattern matching for SVE intrinsics that operate on mask operands #114438
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [DRAFT] Create a single copy of stub templates #114462
    area-VM-coreclr
  • CI tests #113571
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove useless argument from RedirectForThrowControl #114444
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0-staging] [debugger] Fix debugging a x86 app in mixed mode #114077
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Split up loader heap implementations #114246
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [browser] msbuild leaks tesing #114258
    area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • Fix issue when logging stack overflow in WinForm apps. #114432
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Make it possible to preinitialize `ComInterfaceEntry` #114459
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • SLH-DSA implementation for OpenSSL #114060
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Speed up floating to integer casts on x86/x64 #114410
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Interpreter GC info stage 2: Generate empty GC info and add baseline implementation of EnumGcRefs #113948
    area-VM-coreclr, area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • fix: in rsa signatures, configure digest before padding mode #114261
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Send host tests to helix #114187
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Fix stack overflow caused by very deep parent/child Task chains #113407
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
